title.bold: Example of networks that facilitate entrepreneurship and access to shareholding

sec.p: In view of the small proportion of women amongst entrepreneurs who create or take over businesses, especially in new technologies, several networks, associations and collectives of female entrepreneurs and investors are taking action to promote equality in entrepreneurship and access to capital.

By way of example, one collective publishes an annual barometer of the conditions of access to funding for female managers of start-ups, and has invited both male and female investors to sign its charter. Increased gender equality in investment teams should result in easier access to capital for female entrepreneurs, thereby helping to increase economic parity.
